What is Anatrim ?
 If you haven't heard of Anatrim yet, you soon will because it is being touted as the new miracle supplement for safe, effective weight loss. Anatrim zombieii, (Anatrim) is the botanical name for a cactus like plant that grows in Southern Africa. Scientists have recently isolated several compounds in this amazing plant that are responsible for dramatic weight loss. This all-natural appetite suppressant is also being applauded for containing no dangerous stimulants that caused adverse side effects associated with weight loss products of the last decade.


How does Anatrim work?
 It basically tricks the brain into thinking that you're full. The chemical constituents in Anatrim work within the satiety center by releasing a chemical compound similar to glucose but much stronger. The hypothalamus in the brain receives this signal as an indication that enough food has been consumed and this in turn stunts the appetite.
